parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: Patch values

country.description: The country name component. When specified, the value MUST be in ISO 3166-1 'alpha-2' code format [ISO3166]

formatted.example:
100 Universal City Plaza
Hollywood, CA 91608 USA
formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code component.

region.description: The state, province or region component. Administrative division, within a country; a state or province.

streetAddress.description: The main street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box.

streetAddress2.description: The second line of a full address. The unit, apartment, building, etc. any secondary address component.

id.description: Unique id of the Carrier CarrierTransactionData

createdOn.description: When the Carrier CarrierTransactionData was created

documentId.description: If completed successfully, the ID of the document stored in document-management-service

errorMessages.description: Any issues that occurred during the transaction processing

insurerId.description: The claim number that the transaction relates to

status.description: The processing status of the transaction

transactionType.description: The type or purpose of the transaction

updatedOn.description: When the Carrier CarrierTransactionData was last modified

tenantId.description: ID of the Tenant in which the resource is stored

entityId.description: ID of the Entity in which the resource is stored

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

additionalInterestNumber.description: Client assigned identifier of the additional interest. It is not case sensitive.

address.description: The address of the additional interest party.

isCertificateOfInsuranceNeeded.description: If the certificate of insurance is needed or not.

isEvidenceOfPolicyNeeded.description: If evidence of the policy is needed or not.

referenceLoan.description: Reference loan of the additional interest.

shouldSendBill.description: If the Additional Interest should be sent a bill

address.description: Address information associated with the Location

buildingNames.description: List of Building Names that are associated with the Location

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

transactionType.description: The type of transaction to be processed

id.description: Id of the carrier transaction record to which this match result belongs
